data.title: Represent God to the lost and found for transformation in Christ.
data.text:
The Holy Spirit is not just a power, He is not just a Presence; The Holy Spirit is a PERSON and He wants a specific relationship with you. If you are wanting to know the unique position of The Holy Spirit in your life, this message is for you!

“What are you cuffed to?” We’ve all tried to love things that don’t love us back. In this series, God is going to expose what we are cuffed to knowingly or unknowingly, and show us how we can be cuffed to Christ!

Having a greater level of faith leads to a greater level of favor. God wants to show us something beyond our belief. If you’re looking to believe for more, this message is for you!

We all have wanted to get “there”. We’ve all wanted to escape our present circumstances and move on to what we think is better. But what if “here” is right where God wants us to be? In our new series Here Is Holy, Pastor Mike shows us how to ignore “there”, and focus on the here and now.

The promise for this series is that our THINKING changes so that we can turn to God and see, seek, speak and serve the kingdom. If you’re ready for the Rise of a Holy Rebellion, this series is for you!

In this series, Pastor Charles spoke so powerfully about the difference between Purpose and Calling. If you have ever asked questions like, “Why am I here,” “What’s next,” and “What is my purpose,” this series is for you!

In this life-changing series, Pastor Mike talks about being single–not alone, the myths of dating, keys to marriage, the container for sex, and more! If you want to improve all of the relationships in your life, this series is for you!

In this 14-week series, Pastor Mike dives even deeper into the viral series “Relationship Goals.” This is a must-watch for anyone who cares to not only transform the way they relate with others, but the way they relate with God and themselves! You’ll never be the same after this series!

In this series, Pastor Mike shows us what grace truly is and the life-changing power it holds. With messages about finding your anchor and navigating your life with the pace of grace, this series is a great place to start no matter where you are in your walk with God!

Maverick City Music

Maverick City started with a dream to make space for folk that would otherwise live in their own separate worlds. To break the unspoken rules that exist in the CCM and Gospel World! And now it’s the audacious sound of true belonging: The beautiful harmony of long lost family.

Steffany Gretzinger

Even as a young girl, Steffany housed a passion for worship with an innocent, expectant love for the Presence of God. She started writing songs as a way to process the world around her. Steffany’s heart is to minister to the Lord first, giving Him joy and adoration.

UPPERROOM

The music of UPPERROOM is an offering to the Lord that establishes the church in intimacy and encounter. We believe when we encounter His presence, we are transformed and equipped to go out and impact our world.

The Bluejay House

The Bluejay House is a movement of believers carrying a heart for ministering to Jesus and cultivating His presence and revival through worship. We have a heart to see unity among various churches – it’s not about this church or that church, but about us BEING the church.

The Fasting Edge

There is nothing more powerful than fasting. Though it lasts for a short season, it brings long-term effects and blessings. This book is focused on the power of fasting to help you regain your edge when the circumstances of life deplete your spiritual energy and dull your spiritual sharpness. Best-selling author Jentezen Franklin will give us the steps to regaining our edge, which include: Make up your mind to admit it is lost; Confess that you have lost it…and more.

Kingdom Principles

In Kingdom Principles, the second book in his “Kingdom” series, Dr. Munroe insists that we cannot appropriate and enjoy the benefits of God’s Kingdom until we understand how it operates. Kingdom Principles helps you learn to think and act like a Kingdom resident and ruler–the person God intended you to be. Knowing these principles will infuse your life with a new sense of excitement and purpose!

Relationship Goals

In Relationship Goals, Pastor Michael Todd digs deep to give you good news and real-life ideas for making the most of your most important relationships. Whether you are married, single, or it’s complicated, aiming for the right targets will make all the difference in finding true satisfaction. As it turns out, God’s got the best relationship goals of all for your life. Why settle for less?

Crazy Faith

In Crazy Faith, Pastor Michael Todd shows us how to step out in faith and dive into the purposeful life of trusting God for the impossible. Even if you have to start with baby faith or maybe faith, you can become empowered to let go of your lazy faith, trust God through your hazy faith, and learn to live a lifestyle of crazy faith. God’s not looking for somebody to give Him all the reasons why His plans can’t happen. He’s looking for somebody to believe they will happen. In fact, He has so much He wants to do through you. The question is, Are you crazy enough to believe it?

Damaged but not

Destroyed

Damaged but Not Destroyed will give you tools to identify the impact of your damage, see yourself the way God sees you, and realize that healing is all about progression, not perfection. No matter how badly you’ve messed up, and no matter the pain you’ve experienced, nothing can destroy the God-given value of your life. It’s time to turn your damage into destiny! You may be damaged, but you are not destroyed. The value is still in you.

The Blessed Life

Our culture is saturated with false teaching on what it means to be blessed, but what does the Bible say about it? How can we truly live blessed lives? With humor, passion, and clarity, pastor and bestselling author Robert Morris presents the secrets of living a blessed life both financially and spiritually. He shows that when God changes your heart from selfishness to generosity, every part of your life-journey is affected.

The Ruthless Elimination of Hurry

A compelling emotional and spiritual case against hurry and in favor of a slower, simpler way of life. “Hurry is the great enemy of the spiritual life.” Too often we treat the symptoms of toxicity in our modern world instead of trying to pinpoint the cause. A growing number of voices are pointing at hurry, or busyness, as a root of much evil. Within the pages of this book, you’ll find a fascinating roadmap to staying emotionally healthy and spiritually alive in the chaos of the modern world.

Belong Groups are the small group ministry of Transformation Church. Participation in a Belong Group is voluntary. This agreement is between a Participant and Transformation Church. The purpose of one joining a Belong Group is to experience spiritual growth, build community, engage with others in a safe environment where people can be themselves, and have fun meeting on a regular basis.

Belong Groups meet on a Semester basis (usually 12 weeks) with a month break between the Semesters. Groups can meet virtually or in-person. Belong Group Facilitators are volunteer leaders who have applied for the role. A facilitator completes a volunteer application, a background check, and is approved by the Belong Group Department. Training and support are provided by the Belong Group Department and the upper tiers of leadership (Captains and Coaches).

Disclaimer: Belong Group Leaders are volunteers, NOT employees, and if a volunteer leader holds a professional license as a counselor or minister, or happens to be a TC employee, they are NOT operating under those licenses or titles as a volunteer leader when leading a Belong Group at Transformation Church.

As a Belong Group participant you agree not to hold Transformation Church liable for any acts and/or conduct performed by a facilitator outside the scope of their defined or delineated roles for Transformation church as a indicated in the first paragraph and on the https://transformchurch.us/belong/. The following expectations pertain to Belong Group Leaders:

Belong Group leaders will not make requests for financial assistance and/or offerings.

Belong Group leaders should not be collecting money on behalf of TC. If this happens, please report this immediately to belong@transformchurch.us

Belong Group leaders should not be requesting loans or inviting anyone in the group to participate in any type of business ventures or investments.

Belong Group leaders should not request personal information from group members including, but not limited to, social security numbers, physical addresses, and banking/financial information.

Belong Group leaders should not initiate or engage in inappropriate intimate relationships with group members.

Belong Group leaders should not be engaging in one-on-one conversations and or electronic communication with minors.

Please contact belong@transformchurch.us with any questions or reports of violations of these expectations.

Likewise, group participants have the following expectations as voluntary participants in a Belong Group:

Belong Group participants will not make requests for financial assistance and/or offerings.

Belong Group participants should not be collecting money on behalf of TC. If this happens, please report this immediately to belong@transformchurch.us

Belong Group participants should not be requesting loans or inviting anyone in the group to participate in any type of business ventures or investments.

Belong Group participants should not request personal information from group members including, but not limited to, social security number and banking/financial information.</li<Official communication from Transformation Church will come through the following email address: belong@transformchurch.us
